alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 9:31AM PST until February 15 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts near 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, the Mojave Desert Slopes, and the Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 7 AM PST Tuesday until 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree branches may be blown down. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities in some locations. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 58, Highway 178, U.S. Highway 395, and Highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
